  • Method Details

    • selectJoin

      public void selectJoin()
      Method executed after that the text "Join game" is clicked. The "newPane" is set invisible, the text "New game" is blurred, the "joinPane" is set visible.

    • selectNew

      public void selectNew()
      Method executed after that the text "New game" is clicked. The ExistingGameList is set invisible, the text "Join game" is blurred.

    • clickedGame

      public void clickedGame()
      Method executed after the player clicks a row in the list of existing game, i.e. after the player chooses a game to join.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)

    • onContinueButtonClick

      protected void onContinueButtonClick()
      Action executed when the continue button is clicked. It's checked which choice is made, then there is a little client check on the info submitted and then the command is set and executed.
